mapper.update: update member set member_pwd=#{member_pwd}, member_addr=#{member_addr}, member_hp=#{member_hp}, member_email=#{member_email} where member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM member WHERE member_id=#{strId} AND member_pwd=#{strPwd}

select count(*) from notice where notice_div = 4
AND notice_num LIKE '${keyword}'
AND member_id LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND notice_title LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND contents LIKE '%${keyword}%'

select * from(select no.notice_num,per.perf_title,per.perf_image, no.contents, no.member_id, no.writedate,ROWNUM rnum from notice no, performanceInfo per where no.per_id = per.per_id and no.notice_div = 4
AND notice_num LIKE '${keyword}'
AND member_id LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND perf_title LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND contents LIKE '%${keyword}%'
order by writedate desc )
WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end}
